title: Process Policy Renewal Notice
description: An auto policy is coming up for renewal, and the system needs to generate and send the renewal offer.

tasks.description: Identify policies that are within the renewal window (e.g., 45 days before expiration).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a list of policies due for renewal.

tasks.description: For each policy, calculate the renewal premium based on any new rating factors.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system recalculates the premium for the upcoming term.

tasks.description: Generate and send the renewal offer documents to the policyholder.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system mails the complete renewal packet to the customer.
